verses.verse: And <WG1161> it came to pass,<WG1096> that, while Apollos<WG625> was<WG1511> at<WG1722> Corinth,<WG2882> Paul<WG3972> having passed through<WG1330> the<WG3588> upper<WG510> coasts<WG3313> came<WG2064> to<WG1519> Ephesus:<WG2181> and<WG2532> finding<WG2147> certain<WG5100> disciples,<WG3101>

He said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Have<WG1487> ye received<WG2983> the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> since ye believed?<WG4100> And<WG1161> they<WG3588> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> We have not so much as<WG235> <WG3761> heard<WG191> whether<WG1487> there be<WG2076> any Holy<WG40> Ghost.<WG4151>

And <WG5037> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Unto<WG1519> what<WG5101> then<WG3767> were ye baptized?<WG907> And<WG1161> they<WG3588> said,<WG2036> Unto<WG1519> John's<WG2491> baptism.<WG908>

Then <WG1161> said<WG2036> Paul,<WG3972> John<WG2491> verily<WG3303> baptized<WG907> with the baptism<WG908> of repentance,<WG3341> saying<WG3004> unto the<WG3588> people,<WG2992> that<WG2443> they should believe<WG4100> on<WG1519> him which should come<WG2064> after<WG3326> him,<WG846> that is,<WG5123> on<WG1519> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>
When <WG1161> they heard<WG191> this, they were baptized<WG907> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus.<WG2424>

And <WG2532> when Paul<WG3972> had laid<WG2007> his hands<WG5495> upon them,<WG846> the<WG3588> Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> came<WG2064> on<WG1909> them;<WG846> and<WG5037> they spake<WG2980> with tongues,<WG1100> and<WG2532> prophesied.<WG4395>
And <WG1161> all<WG3956> the men<WG435> were<WG2258> about<WG5616> twelve.<WG1177>

And <WG1161> he went<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> synagogue,<WG4864> and spake boldly<WG3955> for the space of<WG1909> three<WG5140> months,<WG3376> disputing<WG1256> and<WG2532> persuading<WG3982> the things<WG3588> concerning<WG4012> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God.<WG2316>

But <WG1161> when<WG5613> divers<WG5100> were hardened,<WG4645> and<WG2532> believed not,<WG544> but spake evil<WG2551> of that way<WG3598> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> multitude,<WG4128> he departed<WG868> from<WG575> them,<WG846> and separated<WG873> the<WG3588> disciples,<WG3101> disputing<WG1256> daily<WG2596> <WG2250> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> school<WG4981> of one<WG5100> Tyrannus.<WG5181>

And <WG1161> this<WG5124> continued<WG1096> by the space of<WG1909> two<WG1417> years;<WG2094> so that<WG5620> all<WG3956> they which dwelt<WG2730> in Asia<WG773> heard<WG191> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> both<WG5037> Jews<WG2453> and<WG2532> Greeks.<WG1672>
And <WG5037> God<WG2316> wrought<WG4160> special<WG3756> <WG5177> miracles<WG1411> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> hands<WG5495> of Paul: <WG3972>

So that<WG5620> <WG2532> from<WG575> his<WG846> body<WG5559> were brought<WG2018> unto<WG1909> the<WG3588> sick<WG770> handkerchiefs<WG4676> or<WG2228> aprons,<WG4612> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> diseases<WG3554> departed<WG525> from<WG575> them,<WG846> and<WG5037> the<WG3588> evil<WG4190> spirits<WG4151> went<WG1831> out of<WG575> them.<WG846>

Then <WG1161> certain<WG5100> of<WG575> the<WG3588> vagabond<WG4022> Jews,<WG2453> exorcists,<WG1845> took upon<WG2021> them to call<WG3687> over<WG1909> them which had<WG2192> evil<WG4190> spirits<WG4151> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> saying,<WG3004> We adjure<WG3726> you<WG5209> by Jesus<WG2424> whom<WG3739> Paul<WG3972> preacheth.<WG2784>
And <WG1161> there were<WG2258> seven<WG2033> sons<WG5207> of one Sceva,<WG4630> a Jew,<WG2453> and chief of the priests,<WG749> which did<WG4160> so.<WG5124>

And <WG1161> the<WG3588> evil<WG4190> spirit<WG4151> answered<WG611> and said,<WG2036> Jesus<WG2424> I know,<WG1097> and<WG2532> Paul<WG3972> I know;<WG1987> but<WG1161> who<WG5101> are<WG2075> ye?<WG5210>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> man<WG444> in<WG1722> whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> evil<WG4190> spirit<WG4151> was<WG2258> leaped<WG2177> on<WG1909> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> overcame<WG2634> them,<WG846> and prevailed<WG2480> against<WG2596> them,<WG846> so that<WG5620> they fled<WG1628> out of<WG1537> that<WG1565> house<WG3624> naked<WG1131> and<WG2532> wounded.<WG5135>

And <WG1161> this<WG5124> was<WG1096> known<WG1110> to all<WG3956> the Jews<WG2453> and<WG2532> Greeks<WG1672> also<WG5037> dwelling<WG2730> at Ephesus;<WG2181> and<WG2532> fear<WG5401> fell<WG1968> on<WG1909> them<WG846> all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> was magnified.<WG3170>
And <WG5037> many<WG4183> that believed<WG4100> came,<WG2064> and confessed,<WG1843> and<WG2532> showed<WG312> their<WG848> deeds.<WG4234>

<WG1161> Many<WG2425> of them also which used<WG4238> curious arts<WG4021> brought their books together,<WG4851> <WG976> and burned<WG2618> them before<WG1799> all<WG3956> men: and<WG2532> they counted<WG4860> the<WG3588> price<WG5092> of them,<WG846> and<WG2532> found<WG2147> it fifty thousand<WG4002> <WG3461> pieces of silver.<WG694>
So <WG3779> mightily<WG2596> <WG2904> grew<WG837> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God<WG2962> and<WG2532> prevailed.<WG2480>

<WG1161> After<WG5613> these things<WG5023> were ended,<WG4137> Paul<WG3972> purposed<WG5087> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> spirit,<WG4151> when he had passed through<WG1330> Macedonia<WG3109> and<WG2532> Achaia,<WG882> to go<WG4198> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2419> saying,<WG2036> After I<WG3165> have been<WG1096> there,<WG1563> I<WG3165> must<WG1163> also<WG2532> see<WG1492> Rome.<WG4516>

So <WG1161> he sent<WG649> into<WG1519> Macedonia<WG3109> two<WG1417> of them that ministered<WG1247> unto him,<WG846> Timothy<WG5095> and<WG2532> Erastus;<WG2037> but he<WG846> himself stayed<WG1907> in<WG1519> Asia<WG773> for a season.<WG5550>
And <WG1161> the same<WG2596> <WG1565> time<WG2540> there arose<WG1096> no<WG3756> small<WG3641> stir<WG5017> about<WG4012> that way.<WG3598>

For <WG1063> a certain<WG5100> man named<WG3686> Demetrius,<WG1216> a silversmith,<WG695> which made<WG4160> silver<WG693> shrines<WG3485> for Diana,<WG735> brought<WG3930> no<WG3756> small<WG3641> gain<WG2039> unto the<WG3588> craftsmen;<WG5079>

Whom <WG3739> he called together<WG4867> with<WG2532> the<WG3588> workmen<WG2040> of<WG4012> like occupation,<WG5108> and said,<WG2036> Sirs,<WG435> ye know<WG1987> that<WG3754> by<WG1537> this<WG5026> craft<WG2039> we have<WG2076> our<WG2257> wealth.<WG2142>

Moreover <WG2532> ye see<WG2334> and<WG2532> hear,<WG191> that<WG3754> not<WG3756> alone<WG3440> at Ephesus,<WG2181> but<WG235> almost<WG4975> throughout all<WG3956> Asia,<WG773> this<WG3778> Paul<WG3972> hath persuaded<WG3982> and turned away<WG3179> much<WG2425> people,<WG3793> saying<WG3004> that<WG3754> they be<WG1526> no<WG3756> gods,<WG2316> which<WG3588> are made<WG1096> with<WG1223> hands: <WG5495>

So that<WG1161> not<WG3756> only<WG3440> this<WG5124> our<WG2254> craft<WG3313> is in danger<WG2793> to be set at naught;<WG2064> <WG1519> <WG557> but<WG235> also<WG2532> that the<WG3588> temple<WG2411> of the<WG3588> great<WG3173> goddess<WG2299> Diana<WG735> should be despised,<WG1519> <WG3762> <WG3049> and<WG1161> her<WG848> magnificence<WG3168> should<WG3195> be<WG2532> destroyed,<WG2507> whom<WG3739> all<WG3650> Asia<WG773> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> world<WG3625> worshippeth.<WG4576>

And <WG1161> when they heard<WG191> these sayings, they were<WG1096> full<WG4134> of wrath,<WG2372> and<WG2532> cried out,<WG2896> saying,<WG3004> Great<WG3173> is Diana<WG735> of the Ephesians.<WG2180>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> whole<WG3650> city<WG4172> was filled<WG4130> with confusion:<WG4799> and<WG5037> having caught<WG4884> Gaius<WG1050> and<WG2532> Aristarchus,<WG708> men of Macedonia,<WG3110> Paul's<WG3972> companions in travel,<WG4898> they rushed<WG3729> with one accord<WG3661> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> theater.<WG2302>
And <WG1161> when Paul<WG3972> would<WG1014> have entered in<WG1525> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> people,<WG1218> the<WG3588> disciples<WG3101> suffered<WG1439> him<WG846> not.<WG3756>

And <WG1161> certain<WG5100> of<WG2532> the<WG3588> chief of Asia,<WG775> which were<WG5607> his<WG846> friends,<WG5384> sent<WG3992> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> desiring<WG3870> him that he would not<WG3361> adventure<WG1325> himself<WG1438> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> theater.<WG2302>

Some therefore cried one thing,<WG243> <WG3303> <WG3767> <WG2896> and some<WG243> another:<WG5100> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> assembly<WG1577> was<WG2258> confused;<WG4797> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> more part<WG4119> knew<WG1492> not<WG3756> wherefore<WG5101> <WG1752> they were come together.<WG4905>

And <WG1161> they drew<WG4264> Alexander<WG223> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> multitude,<WG3793> the<WG3588> Jews<WG2453> putting him forward.<WG4261> <WG846> And<WG1161> Alexander<WG223> beckoned<WG2678> with the<WG3588> hand,<WG5495> and would<WG2309> have made his defense<WG626> unto the<WG3588> people.<WG1218>

But <WG1161> when they knew<WG1921> that<WG3754> he was<WG2076> a Jew,<WG2453> all with one voice<WG1096> <WG5456> <WG3391> <WG1537> <WG3956> about the space of<WG5613> <WG1909> two<WG1417> hours<WG5610> cried out,<WG2896> Great<WG3173> is Diana<WG735> of the Ephesians.<WG2180>

And <WG1161> when the<WG3588> town clerk<WG1122> had appeased<WG2687> the<WG3588> people,<WG3793> he said,<WG5346> Ye men<WG435> of Ephesus,<WG2180> <WG1063> what<WG5101> man<WG444> is<WG2076> there that<WG3739> knoweth<WG1097> not<WG3756> how that the<WG3588> city<WG4172> of the Ephesians<WG2180> is<WG5607> a worshiper<WG3511> of the<WG3588> great<WG3173> goddess<WG2299> Diana,<WG735> and<WG2532> of the image which fell down from Jupiter?<WG1356>

Seeing then<WG3767> that these things<WG5130> cannot be spoken against,<WG5607> <WG368> ye<WG5209> <WG2076> ought<WG1163> to be<WG5225> quiet,<WG2687> and<WG2532> to do<WG4238> nothing<WG3367> rashly.<WG4312>
For <WG1063> ye have brought<WG71> hither these<WG5128> men,<WG435> which are neither<WG3777> robbers of churches,<WG2417> nor<WG3777> yet blasphemers<WG987> of your<WG5216> goddess.<WG2299>

Wherefore <WG3767> if<WG1487> <WG3303> Demetrius,<WG1216> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> craftsmen<WG5079> which are with<WG4862> him,<WG846> have<WG2192> a matter<WG3056> against<WG4314> any man,<WG5100> the law is open,<WG60> <WG71> and<WG2532> there are<WG1526> deputies:<WG446> let them implead<WG1458> one another.<WG240>
But <WG1161> if<WG1487> ye inquire<WG1934> any thing<WG5100> concerning<WG4012> other matters,<WG2087> it shall be determined<WG1956> in<WG1722> a lawful<WG1772> assembly.<WG1577>

For <WG1063> we are in danger<WG2793> to<WG2532> be called in question<WG1458> for<WG4012> this day's<WG4594> uproar,<WG4714> there being<WG5225> no<WG3367> cause<WG158> whereby<WG4012> <WG3739> we may<WG1410> give<WG591> an account<WG3056> of this<WG5026> concourse.<WG4963>
And <WG2532> when he had thus<WG5023> spoken,<WG2036> he dismissed<WG630> the<WG3588> assembly.<WG1577>
